tool_description: Generates comprehensive data exports for customers in compliance with GDPR Article 20 and similar data portability requirements.

export_scope.description: Data categories to include in export

export_format.description: Export format: json, csv, xml, or pdf

include_metadata.description: Whether to include data creation and modification timestamps

anonymize_references.description: Whether to anonymize references to other customers

date_range_start.description: Start date for data range in ISO 8601 format

date_range_end.description: End date for data range in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Customer not found: No profile exists for the provided customer_id.
Invalid export_scope: Provide valid data category names for export.
Invalid export_format: Use one of [json, csv, xml, pdf].
Invalid date range: Ensure date_range_start is before date_range_end and both are in ISO 8601 format.
Export size exceeded: Requested data export exceeds maximum allowed size limits.
Access denied: Customer privacy settings prevent export of some requested data categories.
usage: Provide customer_id and export_scope to generate a data export. Optionally specify format, date ranges, and metadata preferences for customized exports.

export_id.description: Unique identifier for this export request

export_url.description: Secure download URL for the generated export file

export_size_bytes.description: Size of the export file in bytes

records_included.description: Number of data records included in the export
